attributes.action: Prevent the sale by the IFA to a non-terrestrial broadcaster of the rights to live international Nothern Ireland Matches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been reported recently that the Irish Football Association has sold the rights to live international Northern Ireland matches to a well-known non-terrestrial broadcaster. For all other countries in the UK these rights would be protected in the public interest. I call on the prime minister to protect these interests as they are elsewhere and prevent this sale.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
